name: Uniform Supplies
tooltip:
Uniform Supplies

Bring 1 Mooncloth, 2 Bolts of Runecloth and 1 Ironweb Spider Silk to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Mooncloth
- Bolt of Runecloth x 2
- Ironweb Spider Silk
